    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricScore

        public MetricScore(Double score,
           long nr_of_instances)
        Constructor creating a MetricScore that only contains the score field. Used for measures that have no class specific values, like predictive_accurancy.
        Parameters:
        score -

      • MetricScore

        public MetricScore(Double[] array,
           long nr_of_instances)
        Constructor creating a MetricScore that only contains the array field. Used for measures that contain class specific values, but no global flat value.
        Parameters:
        array - -

      • MetricScore

        public MetricScore(Double score,
           Double[] array,
           long nr_of_instances)
        Constructor creating a MetricScore with both a score and array data. Used for measures that contain both a global value and class specific value, like auroc precision, recall.
        Parameters:
        score -
        array -

      • MetricScore

        public MetricScore(double[][] confusion_matrix)
        Fills the metric score with a confussion matrix.

        confusion_matrix -

      • hasArray

        public boolean hasArray()
        Returns:
        true if this score contains array data (confusion matrix or class specific values); false otherwise.

      • getNrOfInstances

        public long getNrOfInstances()
        Returns:
        Returns the number of instances this score was calculated over.
